verses.roman:
navamete 'bhakti-kalpa-vṛkṣera varṇana'
śrī-caitanya-mālī kailā vṛkṣa āropaṇa

synonyms: navamete—in the Ninth Chapter; bhakti-kalpa-vṛkṣera—of the desire tree of devotional service; varṇana—the description; śrī-caitanya-mālī—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu as the gardener; kailā—did; vṛkṣa—the tree; āropaṇa—implantation.
translation: The Ninth Chapter describes the desire tree of devotional service. Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu Himself is the gardener who planted it.
